select count(distinct ff.code) from chits_family_folder ff inner join chits_family_folder_patient ffp on ff.family_folder_id = ffp.family_folder_id inner join obs o on ffp.patient_id = o.person_id where ff.voided = 0 and o.voided = 0 and (ff.date_created >= :startOfPeriod or ff.date_created <= :endOfPeriod) and o.location_id = :locationId
